basicInfo.name: Syed Abrar Husain
basicInfo.tagline: I build secure, scalable, and user-centric web applications.

professionalSummary: Full-Stack Developer skilled in React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL, with a strong passion for building secure, scalable, and user-centric web applications. Experienced in developing real-world platforms like assignment marketplaces and interactive apps, with a focus on clean UI, performance optimization, and secure authentication. Enthusiastic about solving practical problems, collaborating on impactful projects, and refining software architecture.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

projects.name: Writify
projects.description: A university student assignment platform enabling students to request and writers to deliver assignments securely and efficiently.
achievements: Built Google OAuth secure authentication with session management.
Designed responsive, mobile-first UI with dark mode.
Implemented JWT + PostgreSQL session persistence handling 200+ DB transactions/week.
Cut project completion times by up to 8 hours weekly through streamlined assignment workflows.

projects.name: Jamā’ah Journal
projects.description: A multi-faith prayer and reflection tracking PWA serving 100+ daily users with streak analytics and calendar tracking.
achievements: Engineered privacy controls with visibility toggle and leaderboard system, boosting engagement by 40%
Shipped fully responsive PWA with offline mode, install-to-device, and push updates.
Improved mobile retention by 30% with optimized user experience.

projects.name: Blockchain Credential Verification (Hackathon @ IIT Kanpur)
projects.description: A prototype decentralized system for issuing and verifying credentials securely via blockchain.
achievements: Collaborated with a team of 4 at IIT Kanpur hackathon.
Designed user-facing UI for instant certificate verification.

details: Coordinated multiple technical events including a Hackathon.
Boosted turnout by 30% with social media outreach and planning.
Maintained fest website supporting 300+ student registrations in 3 days.
Updated event info and optimized user flows.
Participated in 12-hour Hackathon at IIT Kanpur.
Worked on blockchain-based credential verification system.
